title: Flow, Gumption, Pirsig & Vervaeke
description:
John Vervaeke has a thought-provoking take on the flow state. He gives it more credit for the Good than anyone so far that I have seen, plus he describes ways to implement it which could be very beneficial therapeutically. Pirsig called the flow state "gumption", and the great neuroscientist Jaak Panksepp​ called it enthusiasm, without which we are depressed. 

Vervaeke - Awakening from the Meaning Crisis #2: https://youtu.be/aF9HeXg65AE
My blog: https://aqualityexistence.com/2018/07/08/zamms-practical-advice-from-the-philosophical-gumption-and-its-traps/
Maps: https://maps.org
